subject: From Mrs. Jessica Becker
body:
Dear Friend,

Thanks for your compliment, with reference to your response and i urge to help me received this fund and give it to Children's correct organization home in your country (Daycare Central). I hope you are a God fearing someone. Well i may not live to see the day that will brake tomorrow, but God knows everything. Please i want you to do all in your power to make sure that you receive this money from (CORIS BANK INTERNATIONAL) and do as i have told you to help my soul rest with God.

I have Attach to this email is a scan copy of photos I took on my sick bed with Doctor, I have instructed the Bank management that somebody will apply to the bank for the balance fund with bank. Please i beg you in the name of the God not to be discouraged no matter what i will always be with you in spirit before you to accomplish my dreams, note that you are my hope of making the chance to be with God.

My international passport and other vital information is with bank management and let them know the following procedure, regarding all i have instructed you to do with my balance fund with the bank. Now that i am about to end the race like this without any family members and no child.

I have deposited $5.5 Million US Dollars with CORIS BANK in Burkina Faso and i instructed the bank to transfer the money to you as foreigner that will apply to the bank after i have gone that they should release the fund to you but you will assure me that you will take 50% of the money and give 50% to the orphanages home in your country for my heart to rest.

Below is the information:

Account holder: Mrs Jessica Becker.
Your Address: Rue 102, Flat 5 City Azimo, Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso.
Official in Charge of Remittance: MR .JOEL TOURE
REFERENCE CODE: CORBANK/BF/XX-118/WB/NL-017
DEPOSIT CODE: CORBANK/BFNM/DEP
DEPOSIT NUMBER: CORBANK/0111-781001006245
DEPOSIT TYPE: BANKERS ACCEPTANCE
DATE OF DEPOSIT: 29TH JULY 2002

I communicate you this email with help of the clinic attendant and i may not live to read your email again because my condition is getting worst as i respond to your message, Please pray for me as am about undergoing surgery in three days time as the Doctor said and it all depend on God if i make the surgery or not, I wish you the best in life, and may the God be with you in any thing you do and any were you go.

Note: this is the direct phone number to the Bank Director +226 79178288. call and speak with the Director of the bank and he will be happy to hear from you, contact the bank now through the information bellow:

MR .JOEL TOURE
THE FOREIGN REMITTANCE DIRECTOR
CORIS BANK INTERNATIONAL
OUAGADOUGOU BURKINA FASO
Mobile: +226 79178288
Email: corisbankintbf@financier.com

Regard
Mrs Jessica Becker

subject: Re: From Mrs. Jessica Becker
body:
Dear Mrs. Jessica Becker,

I am deeply moved by your message and the unfortunate circumstances you find yourself in. I want to assure you that I will do my best to fulfill your wishes.

However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things. Could you please provide me with more details about the fund transfer process? How can I contact CORIS BANK and what information do they need from me?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Timothy

subject: Re: From Mrs. Jessica Becker
body:
Note: this is the direct phone number to the Bank Director +226 79178288. call and speak with the Director of the bank and he will be happy to hear from you, contact the bank now through the email address bellow and send copy of my message to them as they will know when they get copy of my message and photo.

MR .JOEL TOURE
THE FOREIGN REMITTANCE DIRECTOR
CORIS BANK INTERNATIONAL
OUAGADOUGOU BURKINA FASO
Mobile: +226 79178288
Email: corisbankintbf@financier.com

Regard
Mrs Jessica Becker

subject: Re: From Mrs. Jessica Becker
body:
Dear Mrs. Jessica Becker,

I hope this message finds you well. I am Mr. Toure, the Foreign Remittance Director at Coris Bank in Burkina Faso. How may I assist you today?

Best Regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Timothy
